summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5127 for the improvement of 16th Avenue West, from Ruffner Street to West Barrett Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 59115, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
